reviews.review:
Игра интересная, большое количество различных механик.
Как только стала бесплатной, появилось большое колличество читеров на оффициальных серверах, чего не скажешь про сервера faceit, советую играть именно на них.
В твоей комманде попадаются рандомные люди, и не все из них юудут создавать приятное ощущение игры.
Ótimo para sugar sua vida recomendo, só não usem hack
hile dolu beyler gabenin koca göbeği az daha büyür ve patlar inşallah alın oyunu oynayın amk
Gostei de tudo, as vezes tem hack
Клёвая игра,особенно если в пати с друзьями,Советую
This game sucks but I keep playing it. 10/10

Melhor jogo fps criado pelo homem. Mecanica de movimentacao e tiros muito boa.
Porem, aquele que criou tambem eh capaz de destruir. Jogo com numero muito alto de cheaters e sem a fiscalizacao adequada.
IKKE NOK LIGESOM WW2 HENTAI ANIME!!
Hile olmadığı sürece çok keyifli oyun.
Be prepared to meet a lot of different people.

Sizin rank sisteminizi sikeyim orospu çocukları. 30 maçtır 5 lose her el 25+kill ile hala nova 4 teyim avradınızı yapacağınız elo sistemini sikeyim karşıma çift keleş geliyor ama beni hala keleşe atmıyor

Clássico,não precisa nem de review.
Quem gosta gosta,quem não gosta curte.
Juegaso, por ahi te relajan, pero con aim los relajas
ESTA LLENO DE CHITERS O HACKERS, LOS SERVIDORES SON DE 60 STICKS, 20 AÑOS Y TODAVIA NO CREAN UN ANTICHEAT PARA PODER JUGAR.
i mean its alright i guess
daca s ar scapa si e codatii :*
Es un juego muy completo, te recomiendo certificarlo si no quieres encontrarte muchos cheaters.
Тупое гавно, с большим количеством смурфов, ботов и читеров
Such a great game and super cool
Too Addicting. Spent to much money. Still Recommend tho
Excelente jogo no cenário competitivo, vicia muito!
Best game ever with prime status and a good economy to go along with the fun of the actual game.
too many hackers but a good game
Sana git diyemem, ama kal demekte gelmiyor içimden...
можно многое узнать о себе, если нет микро

this game is extremely hardcore and easy to get addicted to, but in order to be good at it or get satisfying results u should know that you'll have to put a lot of time and effort in it. It can be frustrating, especially when you get bad teammates. The system doesn't filter out cheaters that often, there are a lot of smurfs if you are a beginner and pray to god you don't get a silver rank because you'll be stuck there forever. Now isn't the time to start playing this game, i'd suggest waiting until Valve make updates to the game after summer 2020 hopefully. I'd suggest buying an account that's already prime from somebody since you'll get depression sooner than rank 21. <3
Altamente Viciante  no bom sentido. Boa mecanica de jogo. Recomendo.
